page.title: 07TOURISM DOWNDERRY/SEATON
page.content: The tourist is a major factor in this community.There are two holiday villages in Downderry and two in Seaton providing a total of 250 self cater flatlets.In addition many private houses are available as holiday lets providing a further 100 units.Caravan and camping sites surround the villages representing a large but variable total.(approx 200) Full board accommodation is rare.The two surviving hotels having small capacity.Bed and Breakfast facilities are readily available in private and farm houses.Thus large summer numbers. Amenities for the tourist are few. There is a riding stable,and a small specialist zoo in the D block.The sea and the beach are the major attraction for the many holiday visitors from other Cornish resorts and residents from the connurbation of Plymouth.
